mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.title, c.cover, c.lesson_num AS lessonNum, c.price, t.name AS teacherName, s1.title AS subjectParentTitle, s2.title AS subjectTitle FROM `course` c LEFT OUTER JOIN `teacher` t ON c.teacher_id = t.id LEFT OUTER JOIN `subject` s1 ON c.subject_id = s1.id LEFT OUTER JOIN `subject` s2 ON c.subject_id = s2.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
